short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness the emotional side of *Scaramouche* from *Genshin Impact* with this powerful live wallpaper for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This moving live wallpaper captures Scaramouche in a rare vulnerable moment, tears streaming down his face as he stands amidst a dark, dramatic background. The animation brings his sorrowful expression to life, creating a deep and emotional atmosphere. Perfect for *Genshin Impact* fans or anyone who appreciates poignant, character-driven visuals.

Along with the captivating animation, this extension includes a customizable Google search bar, popular site shortcuts for easy navigation, and a real-time date and time display. Download now and let Scaramouche's emotional journey transform your Chrome browser!
